description: The heroine gives up on trying to find a way to change back and enjoys her luxurious new life. However, whilst doing some cooking, she ends up using the spoon on herself again, becoming even smaller. She soon learns that the spoon converts her intelligent thoughts into flour, shrinking her to match her intelligence.

titles.title: The Humans` Law of the Jungle #5
人間さんの, じゃくにくきょうしょく #5
